display_help: This shield dramatically reduces the damage an ally takes from Smashing, Lethal, and Toxic attacks for a limited time. You cannot stack multiple Sonic Barriers on the same target, however the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Sonic Haven. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
display_target_help: The Sonic Barrier has increased your resistances to Smashing, Lethal and Toxic damage.
display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from physical attacks with your {PowerName}.
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from physical attacks with a {PowerName}.
